translation: Since then, my training has grown day by day, and my offerings have grown day by day.
The building has been made new.
Dharma Successor of Donglingqin Fashi
Fashi Liyuan.
He had a thorough knowledge of the three collections.
He was well-versed in the three collections and had penetrated all five scriptures.
His training was rich, his path was high, and he was known as the Yuan Canon of the Teaching.
He was known in the world as the store of the Profound Teaching.
He quickly transmitted the path of the Eastern Spirit.
He spread the teachings to Yangtiao.
He gathered a congregation of 300 people and gave lectures every day.
There was no fathomable limit to what could be said about the scriptures and the treatises that he entered and left.

source_sentence: 由是後學多尚泛辨(此卷三十五人本紀遺失十七人)。
translation: As a result, many later scholars still extensively discussed (thirty-five people in this volume lost seventeen people in the original chronicle).
Fozu tongji vol. 16 (end)
